name: Liaison Technologies
description:
Liaison's innovative approach to integration and data management makes a data-centric approach to business possible. Our cutting-edge cloud ALLOY™ Platform is built on big data architecture and microservices technology for scalability, agility, and sheer compute power.
And our integration experts deliver ALLOY's wide range of capabilities—from data collection to transformation to enrichment to storage—as fully managed services, freeing your IT resources to focus on more strategic initiatives. The end result is an ever-growing treasure trove of quality data, at the ready for analysis and insights. Welcome to your data-inspired future!
